title: Driving transformation in the CV industry: highlights from the milestone 15th Apollo CV awards 2024
description: The 15th Apollo CV Awards 2024 celebrated India's commercial vehicle industry at the prestigious event. The awards showcased commitment to transformation and profitability, with industry experts discussing new business models and customer value strategies for the market.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
